actions.name: AssociateMember
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an account with an Amazon Inspector administrator account

actions.name: BatchGetAccountStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Amazon Inspector accounts for an account

actions.name: BatchGetCodeSnippet
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve code snippet information about one or more code vulnerability findings

actions.name: BatchGetFreeTrialInfo
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve free trial period eligibility about Amazon Inspector accounts for an account

actions.name: BatchGetMemberEc2DeepInspectionStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to delegated administrator to retrieve ec2 deep inspection status of member accounts

actions.name: BatchUpdateMemberEc2DeepInspectionStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to update ec2 deep inspection status by delegated administrator for its associated member accounts

actions.name: CancelFindingsReport
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel the generation of a findings report

actions.name: CreateFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to create and define the settings for a findings filter

actions.name: CreateFindingsReport
actions.description: Grants permission to request the generation of a findings report

actions.name: DeleteFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a findings filter

actions.name: DescribeOrganizationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Inspector configuration settings for an AWS organization

actions.name: Disable
actions.description: Grants permission to disable an Amazon Inspector account

actions.name: DisableDelegatedAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to disable an account as the delegated Amazon Inspector administrator account for an AWS organization

actions.name: DisassociateMember
actions.description: Grants permission to an Amazon Inspector administrator account to disassociate from an Inspector member account

actions.name: Enable
actions.description: Grants permission to enable and specify the configuration settings for a new Amazon Inspector account

actions.name: EnableDelegatedAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to enable an account as the delegated Amazon Inspector administrator account for an AWS organization

actions.name: GetConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Inspector configuration settings for an AWS account

actions.name: GetDelegatedAdminAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Inspector administrator account for an account

actions.name: GetEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve ec2 deep inspection configuration for standalone accounts, delegated administrator and member account

actions.name: GetFindingsReportStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve status for a requested findings report

actions.name: GetMember
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an account that's associated with an Amazon Inspector administrator account

actions.name: ListAccountPermissions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve feature configuration permissions associated with an Amazon Inspector account within an organization

actions.name: ListCoverage
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the types of statistics Amazon Inspector can generate for resources Inspector monitors

actions.name: ListCoverageStatistics
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve statistical data and other information about the resources Amazon Inspector monitors

actions.name: ListDelegatedAdminAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the delegated Amazon Inspector administrator account for an AWS organization

actions.name: ListFilters
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all findings filters

actions.name: ListFindingAggregations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve statistical data and other information about Amazon Inspector findings

actions.name: ListFindings
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a subset of information about one or more findings

actions.name: ListMembers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Inspector member accounts that are associated with an Inspector administrator account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the tags for an Amazon Inspector resource

actions.name: ListUsageTotals
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve aggregated usage data for an account

actions.name: SearchVulnerabilities
actions.description: Grants permission to list Amazon Inspector coverage details for a specific vulnerability

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update the tags for an Amazon Inspector resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Amazon Inspector resource

actions.name: UpdateConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update information about the Amazon Inspector configuration settings for an AWS account

actions.name: UpdateEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update ec2 deep inspection configuration by delegated administrator, member and standalone account

actions.name: UpdateFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to update the settings for a findings filter

actions.name: UpdateOrgEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update ec2 deep inspection configuration by delegated administrator for its associated member accounts

actions.name: UpdateOrganizationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update Amazon Inspector configuration settings for an AWS organization
